item.title: Machine Learning
item.description: # ML ## Suppervised Learning - Training Data - Labels - Gradient Descent ## Self-Supervised Learning - Pre-Trained Model(Foundation Model) - unlabeled Data - Downstream Tasks - Models - BERT - ELMo - GPT-2 - GPT-3 - T5 ## Generative Adversarial Network - 收集大量x和y - x和y是unpaired - 研究成果 - [Unsupervised

item.title: Ai介绍
item.description: 介绍 Regression: Input a vector, the function outputs a scalar. Classification: Given options(classes), the function outputs the correct one. Structured Learning: Create something with structure (image, document). 回归问题 预测问题：根据前面的浏览数据，预测后面的浏览量 Function with Unknown Parameters Model: $y = b + wx_1$ $y$(Label): no. of views on
